discount_rules: Walk 10 000+ steps in any 24-hour window and get 10‚Ç¨ off our 45-minute Executive Detox Massage (regular price 45‚Ç¨).
Every additional 10 000 steps takes 10‚Ç¨ more off, up to 30‚Ç¨ total discount.
Show a dated screenshot from your favourite fitness app at check-in.
The qualifying step day must fall within the 10 days before you book, meet that rule and we'll apply the discount in person.
Offer valid exclusively for the 45-minute Executive Detox Massage.

about.therapist_cert: Cert. ISMET - Instituto Superior de Medicinas Tradicionales
about.approach_quote:
With a degree in cognitive behavioral psychology and a deep curiosity about how people think and act, I found myself working in marketing and data analysis, exploring behavior and trends.

At the same time, I kept nurturing my true passion‚Äîmovement, balance, and energy. Inspired by martial arts and Eastern healing traditions, my focus naturally shifted. Since 2020, I've been dedicated to foot reflexology, Qi Gong, Yoga and subtle energy work, helping people restore harmony and well-being in a gentle, natural way.
